archimate:Requirement.name: BC.2.1.3b: b) based on a set of scenarios of possible disasters, taking account of the results of risk assessments, particularly the frequency and severity of previous security-related incidents
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
